questions: Name the property of metal by which it can be drawn into wires ?
Name the materials that are not sonorous and are poor conductors of heat and electricity.
Name the metal that is found in liquid state at room temperature.

answers: Metals oxides are formed when metal reacts with oxygen.

questions: Write two physical properties of metal.
Why is immersion rod used for heating liquids is made of metallic substances ?
answers: It is because metallic substances are good conductors of electricity.

questions: Why are sodium and potassium are stored in Kerosene ?
answers: It is because they react vigorously with oxygen and water.

questions: Why copper cannot displace zinc from its salt solution ?
answers: It is because zinc is more reactive than copper. MATERIALS : METALS AND NON-METALS
